description: This file is a C header file providing function prototypes, macro guards, and licensing information for the Server Detection Object (SDO) in a BroadWay Service Delivery System. It exclusively declares exported functions related to SDO object creation, initialization, removal, and object enrollment.

methods.name: CfSdoComponentCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Server Detection Object component with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: CfSdoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Server Detection Object with specified contexts.

methods.name: CfSdoRemove
methods.description: Removes an instance of the Server Detection Object.

methods.name: CfSdoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects for the Server Detection Object.

methods.name: CfSdoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Server Detection Object instance.
